Functions
Item
export default function Item(
{ item }
)

Generates page for the customer to get information about an item and add it to their cart.

Parameters
{item}

Object containing object that has at least menu_item_info_id, name, and price properties

Returns

<div> tag containing page

export async function getServerSideProps(
context
)

Get information about selected item from API server.

Parameters

context object containing information about browser session including any queries in the URL

Returns
